long_description: The Roxy Rockferry snow goggles feature a spherical lens made by Carl Zeiss for exceptional optics, so you can clearly see what's down the mountain as you pick your optimal lines. Amber-tinted lens performs best in cloudy or snowy conditions; mirror coating helps cut glare for excellent definition. Distortion-free, shatter-resistant Carl Zeiss spherical lens delivers exceptional optical clarity and a large field of vision. Antifog treatment and vents combat lens fogging. Durable frame is made of a flexibile polyurethane to provide a comfortable fit. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around your face. Helmet compatible design; adjustable strap provides a custom fit. Roxy Rockferry snow goggles come with a microfiber storage bag that can also be used to clean the lens.
short_description: The Roxy Rockferry snow goggles feature a spherical lens made by Carl Zeiss for exceptional optics, so you can clearly see what's down the mountain as you pick your optimal lines.
